document_data.name: Grundlgornn
document_data.mainbody:
'''Grundlgornn''' was an inhabitant of the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Gods, I don't want to die. Not now. Not here.''|Grundlgornn}}
document_data.Description: Grundlgornn was a tan-skinned beardless dwarf with short and dark curly hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Grundlgornn found himself listening to a curbside preacher of [[Talona]], [[Umbrenne]], spewing out his beliefs of the cycle of life and death being carried out through pestilence. Despite not being interested in the [[Talonite]] faith, Grundlgornn was terrified of the priest's promises of [[plague]]s.
